items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 360 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 145 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.checkin_comment: Sour, yes. Fruity, yes. Goes down easy

items.badge_description: It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 35 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 8!

user.bio: Untappd Moderator (M2) Melbourne, Australia. Lover of all things beer! Beer ratings and descriptions are my own.

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 11 years on Untappd!
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 455 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 92!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 11 years on Untappd!
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 25 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 20 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 5.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 85 distinct venues!
It's been a year since your last birthday on Untappd? Whoa - time flies! Happy birthday to you from all of us at Untappd!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 85 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 18! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Doesn’t taste much like a beer. But the sour fruits do come through well. Delivers exactly what it says on the tin.

user.bio: Home brewer, craft brewer, beer educator, beer drinker.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 160 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 33!
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 185 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 38!
